# Alok Tiwari

Alok Tiwari (born 1 June 1972 om Village Jamuni, Siddharth Nagar District) is a politician from Samajwadi Party.
He is a member of Rajya Sabha from Uttar Pradesh for the term 2012â€“2018, since the bye-election held in June 2012 due to the death of his father Brij Bhushan Tiwari.
